Module org.panteleyev.freedesktop
Package org.panteleyev.freedesktop.directory

Class XDGBaseDirectory

java.lang.Object
org.panteleyev.freedesktop.directory.XDGBaseDirectory
public abstract class XDGBaseDirectory extends Object
Implements XDG Base Directory Specification.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Path
    getCacheHome()
    Returns the base directory relative to which user specific non-essential data files should be stored.
    static Set<Path>
    getConfigDirs()
    Returns the preference-ordered set of base directories to search for configuration files in addition to the $XDG_CONFIG_HOME base directory.
    static Path
    getConfigHome()
    Returns the base directory relative to which user specific configuration files should be stored.
    static Set<Path>
    getDataDirs()
    Returns the preference-ordered set of base directories to search for data files in addition to the $XDG_DATA_HOME base directory.
    static Path
    getDataHome()
    Returns the base directory relative to which user specific data files should be stored.
    static Optional<Path>
    getRuntimeDir()
    Returns the base directory relative to which user-specific non-essential runtime files and other file objects (such as sockets, named pipes, ...) should be stored.
    static Path
    getStateHome()
    Returns directory that contains state data that should persist between (application) restarts, but that is not important or portable enough to the user that it should be stored in $XDG_DATA_HOME.
    static Path
    getSystemDesktopEntryDirectory()
    Returns system desktop entries directory.
    static Path
    getUserDesktopEntryDirectory()
    Returns user desktop entries directory.

  • Method Details

    • getDataHome

      public static Path getDataHome()
      Returns the base directory relative to which user specific data files should be stored. If $XDG_DATA_HOME is either not set or empty, a default equal to $HOME/.local/share should be used.
      Returns:
      data files directory path

    • getConfigHome

      public static Path getConfigHome()
      Returns the base directory relative to which user specific configuration files should be stored. If $XDG_CONFIG_HOME is either not set or empty, a default equal to $HOME/.config should be used.
      Returns:
      configuration files directory path

    • getStateHome

      public static Path getStateHome()
      Returns directory that contains state data that should persist between (application) restarts, but that is not important or portable enough to the user that it should be stored in $XDG_DATA_HOME.
      Returns:
      state data directory path

    • getDataDirs

      public static Set<Path> getDataDirs()
      Returns the preference-ordered set of base directories to search for data files in addition to the $XDG_DATA_HOME base directory. The directories in $XDG_DATA_DIRS should be seperated with a colon ':'.

      If $XDG_DATA_DIRS is either not set or empty, a value equal to /usr/local/share/:/usr/share/ should be used.

      Returns:
      additional data files locations

    • getConfigDirs

      public static Set<Path> getConfigDirs()
      Returns the preference-ordered set of base directories to search for configuration files in addition to the $XDG_CONFIG_HOME base directory. The directories in $XDG_CONFIG_DIRS should be seperated with a colon ':'.

      If $XDG_CONFIG_DIRS is either not set or empty, a value equal to /etc/xdg should be used.

      Returns:
      additional configuration files locations

    • getCacheHome

      public static Path getCacheHome()
      Returns the base directory relative to which user specific non-essential data files should be stored. If $XDG_CACHE_HOME is either not set or empty, a default equal to $HOME/.cache should be used.
      Returns:
      cache files directory path

    • getRuntimeDir

      public static Optional<Path> getRuntimeDir()
      Returns the base directory relative to which user-specific non-essential runtime files and other file objects (such as sockets, named pipes, ...) should be stored.
      Returns:
      runtime directory path

    • getSystemDesktopEntryDirectory

      public static Path getSystemDesktopEntryDirectory()
      Returns system desktop entries directory.
      Returns:
      system desktop entries directory

    • getUserDesktopEntryDirectory

      public static Path getUserDesktopEntryDirectory()
      Returns user desktop entries directory.
      Returns:
      user desktop entries directory
